listitem.para: n. Abbreviation for "Question and Answer," this format is listed in the American Heritage Dictionary.

note.para: In DocBook XML, the title is defined by the DocBook style sheets for the <qandadiv> element. The relevant generated text in English is "Q & A" and is localized automatically.

listitem.para:
Lowercase at all times.
Based on information from Linux on System z: Device Drivers, Features and Commands at http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/linux/linux390/development_documentation.html#1
Use with caution. This term is readily understood in the context of databases and stateful systems, but in other contexts another term might be more suitable.
